title: Implement deletion of tasks
description: Implement the ability to delete tasks upon pressing the 'd' key. Well I may edit this task while I am doing stuff and the time should increase.

title: Cursor behaviour
description:
Implement all normal cursor behaviour:
 - Going back and forward through the command line.
 - Going up and down lines.
 - At end/beginning of lines, go to the end/beginning of line.

title: Implement closure of tasks
description: Upon pressing the 'c' key, the done tasks shall disappear from the list and their stats archived.
